summary: BuildRequest contained no stated requirements or acceptance criteria, but the diff introduces a multi-screen interactive frontend experience (warning gate, 404/invitation/celebration flow), visual effects, share-link copying, styling changes, and backend placeholder changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/implemented a multi-screen interactive app flow (warning gate → 404 → invitation → celebration) with state transitions and button behaviors.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so this functionality was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Implemented a 'WarningGate' UI with risk messaging and a copy-to-clipboard share link.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so this functionality was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added confetti and fireworks canvas animation effects.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so these visual effects were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a custom hook for generating/copying a share URL (useShareLink) and a deployment URL configuration helper.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so this share-link/deployment-domain functionality was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced substantial global styling/theme changes (Quicksand font, pastel OKLCH palette, animations) and Tailwind configuration updates, plus HTML title/font preconnect changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so these styling/config changes were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified backend main.mo to an empty actor placeholder.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, and no backend change was requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added an empty placeholder queries hook file (useQueries.ts) indicating no backend queries needed.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so adding placeholder architecture files was not requested.
